Class ReteKB

java.lang.Object
  zeus.concepts.AbstractTask
      zeus.concepts.ReteKB
public class ReteKB
extends AbstractTask

this is the definition of a kb in Zeus for the Rulebase tasks.

See Also:
Rule, ReteEngine
